audit_com:steps.step:step_1: Scan the entire repo directory tree.
audit_com:steps.step:step_3: Compare each file to see if the datasets are missing related datapoints in other files.
audit_com:steps.step:step_4: Look at what remains open in the entire project.
audit_com:steps.step:step_5: List the gaps that remain open in the project.

step:step_rules.rule:Datasets: Datasets can be the same, only if they are in different formats.
step:step_rules.rule:Legal: Take all current legal considerations to mind.
step:step_rules.rule:Output: When outputing the gaps, give hints to where to look next.
step:step_rules.rule:Privacy: Never suggest living people, or information related to them.
